dict.acceptation: 保存，储备，储存；[商]准备金，公积金；预备品；储藏量；

sent.orig: Federal Reserve System includes 12 regional Federal Reserve Banks and 25 Federal Reserve Bank branches.
sent.trans: 联邦储备系统包括12家地区性联邦储备银行和25家联邦储备银行的分行。

sent.orig: The Federal Reserve System includes 12 regional Federal Reserve Banks and 25 Federal Reserve Bank branches.
sent.trans: 联邦储备系统包括１２家地区性联邦储备银行和２５家联邦储备银行的分行。

sent.orig: General Loss Reserve [IFC] : Loss Reserve set up to replace Unidentified Loss Reserve.
sent.trans: 一般损失准备金[国际金融公司]：这项准备金的设立是用来代替“未确定损失准备金”的。

sent.orig: The federal reserve with Federal Reserve would gain new powers.
sent.trans: 联邦储备系统将会获得新的权利。

sent.orig: Reserve junior officers: reserve Captain, Lieutenant and Second Lieutenant.
sent.trans: （三）预备役尉官：预备役上尉、中尉、少尉。
